Lines.Line: Now that you have equipped a spellcode, it will spawn in the actions tab along with your equipped spells.
Spellcodes that spawn in the action stack are denoted by number icons.
These numbers correspond to the order your spellcodes have been equipped in your spellcode inventory.
Let's try to clear this ice block and move forward to the next objective by only using your spellcode.
As you notice, using spellcodes allow us to be more efficient in performing spells.
Compared to dragging spells one by one, we can perform more spells in one execution!
Spellcodes also count as performing one move in a stage!
You can use this fact to your advantage especially when you're aiming to get all stars in a stage!
